Issue: https://github.com/Jhon-Crow/cassette-sound-music-player/issues/34

Created a comprehensive test script that verifies the always-on-top
setting persistence works correctly. The test simulates:
- Initial settings load with default value
- Setting always-on-top to true and saving
- App restart and verifying the setting persists
- Setting always-on-top to false and saving
- Another app restart and verifying the new value persists

All tests pass, confirming that the persistence feature is already
fully implemented and working correctly.

The feature was originally added in commit 9fa8315 on 2026-01-01.
